description: The state machine for the chimerapy cluster

INITIALIZED.name: INITIALIZED
INITIALIZED.description: The cluster is initialized and ready to be committed

INSTANTIATED.name: INSTANTIATED
INSTANTIATED.description: The cluster is instantiated with a pipeline and it is ready to be committed

COMMITTED.name: COMMITTED
COMMITTED.description: The cluster is committed and ready to be run or reset

PREVIEWING.name: PREVIEWING
PREVIEWING.description: The cluster is previewing the pipeline and ready to be recorded/reset

RECORDING.name: RECORDING
RECORDING.description: The cluster is recording the pipeline and ready to be previewed/run/reset
